short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We aim to provide an easy method of calculating nutritional information of food recipes. Made by Connor Uong and Steven Teng.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is made with the goal of addressing transparency in our food's nutritional information. In a world of highly processed food and dishonest business practices, people who wants to eat healthy by cooking using online recipes are often left in the dark about the nutritional information of the food they are consuming. We aim to provide an easy solution to this problem by providing a simple and easy way to calculate the nutritional information of the food you are consuming.

Made by Connor Uong and Steven Teng.
